before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"2787c","text":"It's best to start small-scale protein purification on a Monday or Tuesday. This protocol will take at least 3 days before the first freezing step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3cd98","text":"Take the BL21 glycerol stock from the   freezer and place immediately into the ice bucket.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8857p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1nkug","text":"Label a  culture tube with the vector strain you will be using, and fill with    of LB broth with 1x Kanamycin antibiotic or 5ul of 1000x.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":78,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"lao8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4nv0r","text":"Use a   pipette tip to scrape some of the ice from the tube, and place the tip directly into the culture tube with LB.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":6,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e39hq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9sn9i","text":"Place the labeled tube into the shaking incubator to warm, then grab an ice bucket and fill with ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"980b3","text":"Let the culture shake at   overnight to be completely saturated by the next morning.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5kjkt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6nkee","text":"Grab a sterilized   Erlenmeyer flask and fill with 45mL of Terrific Broth and 1x Kanamycin antibiotic.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d2i8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"250","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b9odn","text":"Prewarm the flask in the shaking tube incubator at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":51,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"50qju","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7st1e","text":"Add all   of the seed culture to the Erlenmeyer flask. The culture should expand 1:10 in 1-2 hours, to an OD around 0.4-0.6.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9j3ju","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"afpl5","text":"Thaw a stock of IPTG on ice about 30 minutes before you suspect the culture will be at 0.4 OD.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

Be sure to blank with   of Terrific Broth.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":38,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":100,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cn6vd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

This will most likely be a range of   to  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":6,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":142,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":147,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"42kgn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":22}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"8CCDA00A74A911EFB1620A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fbssb","text":"To calculate IPTG concentration,  use V1 x C1 = V2 x C2, where column E is equivalent to V2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9sb6r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ek2rt","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fdg5r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"C_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"C_2":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"C_3":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"C_4":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"C_5":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"E_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"E_2":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"E_3":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"E_4":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"E_5":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["","","","",""],"colWidths":[100,100,100,100,100],"data":[["50mL","1mM","?","1000mM","50uL"],["50mL","0.8mM","?","1000mM","40uL"],["50mL","0.6mM","?","1000mM","30uL"],["50mL","0.4mM","?","1000mM","20uL"],["50mL","0.2mM","?","1000mM","10uL"]],"guid":"C38AE35B18A548329E0FADC94742F628","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"f4lr","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["50mL","1mM","?","1000mM","50uL"],["50mL","0.8mM","?","1000mM","40uL"],["50mL","0.6mM","?","1000mM","30uL"],["50mL","0.4mM","?","1000mM","20uL"],["50mL","0.2mM","?","1000mM","10uL"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8kd0j","text":"Take your IPTG-induced culture and shake overnight at   for about 16-18 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":54,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"16","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5cpjp","text":"Take each   culture and pour into a   conical tube, labelled.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":10,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"11bfg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1b8eo","text":"Take the cells to a large or spinning-bucket centrifuge and spin at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":68,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"14d20","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"500","start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dqiac","text":"Decant cells into a bleach waste bin labeled for culture, and dry on a paper towel for 5-10 seconds","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
